other_tests.findings: Psychotic symptoms improved, with Carlos reporting he no longer felt 'picked on' or saw lines after initiation of clozapine.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Psychotic symptoms were observed to remit with a dose of 300 mg/day of clozapine at 6-month follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Lamotrigine was initiated based on its potential efficacy for obsessive-compulsive symptoms in schizophrenia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 10 weeks, Carlosâ€™s obsessive-compulsive symptoms decreased by about 40% while his psychotic symptoms remained in remission.

other_tests.findings: Initial plans made to begin therapy targeting residual obsessive-compulsive symptoms.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Carlos did not complete the therapy due to doubts about its effectiveness.
